body_html:
thats correct - apparently tensorflow does not optimize "nested" operations, so
tf.matmul(tf.transpose(tf.conj(a)), x) takes significantly longer time than b = tf.conj(a), c = tf.transpose(b), and d = tf.matmul(c, x).
body_text:
thats correct - apparently tensorflow does not optimize "nested" operations, so
tf.matmul(tf.transpose(tf.conj(a)), x) takes significantly longer time than b = tf.conj(a), c = tf.transpose(b),  and d = tf.matmul(c, x).
body:
thats correct - apparently tensorflow does not optimize "nested" operations, so 
`tf.matmul(tf.transpose(tf.conj(a)), x)` takes significantly longer time than `b = tf.conj(a)`, `c = tf.transpose(b)`,  and `d = tf.matmul(c, x)`.
